rule_15.title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials

error_types.error_type: Missing CFR Volume Number in Regulation Citation
error_types.description: Regulation citation lacks the required volume number before C.F.R.

error_types.error_type: Incorrect CFR Year Format
error_types.description: CFR year provided as retrieval date instead of current edition year
error_types.example_incorrect: 40 C.F.R. § 261.4 (last visited Jan. 5, 2020)

error_types.error_type: Missing Page/Date in Federal Register Citation
error_types.description: Federal Register citation lacks required page number or publication date

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Executive Order Format
error_types.description: Executive order citation lacks required Federal Register publication info
error_types.example_incorrect: Exec. Order No. 13,999
error_types.example_correct: Exec. Order No. 13,999, 75 Fed. Reg. 12456 (Mar. 1, 2010)

error_types.error_type: Missing Proclamation Publication Source
error_types.description: Presidential proclamation citation lacks publication source information
error_types.example_incorrect: Proclamation No. 9,999 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Proclamation No. 9,999, 85 Fed. Reg. 12456 (Mar. 1, 2020)

error_types.error_type: Incomplete Agency Manual Citation
error_types.description: Agency publication lacks required title, date, or identifying information
error_types.example_incorrect: FDA Guidance (2019)
error_types.example_correct: U.S. Food & Drug Admin., Guidance for Industry: X Title (2019)

error_types.error_type: Missing Section References in Multiple Sections
error_types.description: Citation to multiple CFR sections fails to use proper 'et seq.' notation

error_types.error_type: Improper Federal Register Date Format
error_types.description: Federal Register publication date uses incorrect format or is incomplete

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Party Name Format in Admin Citation
error_types.description: Administrative adjudication citation uses improper party naming convention
error_types.example_incorrect: Smith and Jones versus Agency (NLRB 2019)
error_types.example_correct: In re Smith, or Smith v. Agency (NLRB 2019)

error_types.error_type: Missing Docket Number When No Official Style
error_types.description: Administrative adjudication without official case name fails to cite docket number
error_types.example_correct: FTC Docket No. 123-4567 (2019)

error_types.subrule_title: Administrative Adjudications - Which Source to Cite
error_types.error_type: Citing Secondary Source When Primary Reporter Available
error_types.description: Administrative decision cited to commercial service when official reporter exists
error_types.example_incorrect: Smith v. Agency, Westlaw (NLRB 2019)
error_types.example_correct: Smith v. Agency, 365 N.L.R.B. 123 (2019)

error_types.subrule_title: Administrative Adjudications - Which Source to Cite
error_types.error_type: Incomplete Citation to Non-Reported Decision
error_types.description: Unpublished administrative decision lacks required agency decision number or URL
error_types.example_incorrect: FTC Decision (2019)
error_types.example_correct: FTC Decision No. C-1234 (2019) or FTC Decision (2019), https://...

error_types.error_type: Missing Agency Identification Parenthetical
error_types.description: Citation to administrative decision lacks agency identification where not obvious from reporter
error_types.example_incorrect: Smith v. Agency, 456 F. Supp. 2d 789 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Smith v. Agency, 456 F. Supp. 2d 789 (FTC 2020)

error_types.error_type: Ambiguous Arbitration Panel Designation
error_types.description: Arbitration decision citation lacks clear identification of arbitration body
error_types.example_incorrect: Decision 456 (2019)
error_types.example_correct: Decision 456 (Arb. Panel: X Ass'n 2019)

error_types.error_type: Missing Database Name in Electronic Citation
error_types.description: Electronic database citation lacks identification of the database used
error_types.example_incorrect: (FAA Order No. 2018-1)
error_types.example_correct: (FAA Order No. 2018-1, Westlaw)

error_types.error_type: Incomplete Agency Website Citation
error_types.description: Agency website citation lacks required URL or sufficient identification
error_types.example_incorrect: (agency website)
error_types.example_correct: (FAA, https://www.faa.gov/documents/order-2018-1.pdf)

error_types.error_type: Slip Opinion Citation Missing Required Information
error_types.description: Slip opinion from agency lacks date or sufficient identifying information
error_types.example_incorrect: EPA Slip Opinion (on file)
error_types.example_correct: EPA Slip Opinion (Mar. 15, 2020) (on file with author)

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Use of 'Id.' for Different Regulation
error_types.description: Using 'Id.' to reference different regulation than immediately preceding citation

error_types.error_type: Ambiguous Short Citation to Regulation
error_types.description: Short form regulation citation lacks prior full citation context for clarity
error_types.example_incorrect: § 261.4 (without prior full cite in same document)
error_types.example_correct: [After full cite] § 261.4 [when context is clear]

error_types.error_type: Incorrect 'Supra Note' Format for Regulations
error_types.description: Using supra note incorrectly for regulation citations when full cite should be repeated
error_types.example_incorrect: 40 C.F.R. § 261.4 (2020). [footnote 5] Supra note 3.
error_types.example_correct: [footnote 3: full cite] [footnote 5: id. or repeat full citation]

rule_15_books_and_reports.rule_title: Books, Reports, and Other Nonperiodic Materials

error_types.error_type: Missing Middle Initial in Author Name
error_types.description: Author citation omits middle initial when provided in source
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, Book Title (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Q. Smith, Book Title (2020)

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Et Al. Usage for Two Authors
error_types.description: Using 'et al.' for two-author work instead of listing both authors
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith et al., Book Title (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith & Jane Doe, Book Title (2020)

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Ampersand Usage in Author Names
error_types.description: Using 'and' instead of '&' to separate multiple authors
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith and Jane Doe, Book Title (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith & Jane Doe, Book Title (2020)

error_types.error_type: Improper Institutional Author Abbreviation
error_types.description: Institutional author uses non-standard or excessive abbreviation
error_types.example_incorrect: USAMD, Report Title (2020)
error_types.example_correct: U.S. Army Medical Dept., Report Title (2020) [or approved abbreviation]

error_types.error_type: Inconsistent Author Name Format
error_types.description: Author name format differs from that shown on title page
error_types.example_incorrect: Smith, J., Book Title (2020) [when title page shows 'John Smith']
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, Book Title (2020)

error_types.error_type: Missing Editor Designation Abbreviation
error_types.description: Editor or translator name included without required 'ed.' or 'trans.' abbreviation
error_types.example_incorrect: Book Title (John Doe, 2020)
error_types.example_correct: Book Title (John Doe ed., 2020)

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Plural Editor Abbreviation
error_types.description: Using singular 'ed.' for multiple editors instead of 'eds.'
error_types.example_incorrect: Book Title (John Doe & Jane Smith ed., 2020)
error_types.example_correct: Book Title (John Doe & Jane Smith eds., 2020)

error_types.error_type: Including Editor When Author Present and Not Primary Association
error_types.description: Including editor designation when main author is present and edition not primarily associated with editor
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, Book Title (Jane Doe ed., 2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, Book Title (2020)

error_types.error_type: Title Not Italicized in Citation
error_types.description: Book title presented in regular type instead of italics
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, Book Title (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, Book Title (2020) [with Book Title in italics]

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Capitalization of Article in Title
error_types.description: Article ('a', 'an', 'the') capitalized when it should not be
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, The Book Title Here (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, The Book Title Here (2020) [if begins title] or John Smith, Book Title Here (2020) [if mid-title]

error_types.error_type: Failure to Capitalize Main Title Words
error_types.description: Main nouns, verbs, and adjectives not capitalized in title
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, book title and the law (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, Book Title and the Law (2020)

error_types.error_type: Missing Subtitle After Colon
error_types.description: Subtitle present in source but omitted from citation
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, Book Title (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, Book Title: Subtitle (2020)

error_types.error_type: Omitted Multi-Volume Series Designation
error_types.description: Citation to specific volume of multi-volume series lacking volume number
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, Book Title (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, 5 Book Title (2020)

error_types.error_type: Missing Edition Designation for Non-First Edition
error_types.description: Non-first edition cited without edition number
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, Book Title (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, Book Title (2d ed. 2020)

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Edition Abbreviation Format
error_types.description: Edition abbreviation uses incorrect format (e.g., '2D' instead of '2d')
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, Book Title (2D ED. 2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, Book Title (2d ed. 2020)

error_types.error_type: Missing Publication Year
error_types.description: Citation lacks required publication year
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, Book Title
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, Book Title (2020)

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Year Format or Range
error_types.description: Publication year presented as range or with incorrect format
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, Book Title (2019-2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, Book Title (2020)

error_types.error_type: Incomplete Publisher Information for Specialized Work
error_types.description: Lesser-known work or specialized edition cited without publisher when clarity needed
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, Book Title (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, Book Title (Oxford Univ. Press 2020)

error_types.error_type: Chapter Title in Italics Instead of Quotes
error_types.description: Chapter or essay title italicized when it should be in quotation marks
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Essay Title, in Book Title 123 (Jane Smith ed., 2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Essay Title, in Book Title 123 (Jane Smith ed., 2020) [with Essay Title in quotes]

error_types.error_type: Missing Starting Page of Collection
error_types.description: Citation to work in collection lacks page on which piece begins
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Essay Title, in Book Title (Jane Smith ed., 2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Essay Title, in Book Title 123 (Jane Smith ed., 2020)

error_types.error_type: Missing Pinpoint Page in Collection
error_types.description: Collection citation lacks pinpoint reference to cited page
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Essay Title, in Book Title 123 (Jane Smith ed., 2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Essay Title, in Book Title 123, 130 (Jane Smith ed., 2020)

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Multiple Editor Format
error_types.description: Using 'ed.' instead of 'eds.' for multiple editors in collection
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Essay Title, in Book Title 123 (Jane Smith & John Brown ed., 2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Essay Title, in Book Title 123 (Jane Smith & John Brown eds., 2020)

error_types.error_type: Missing Volume Number in Multi-Volume Collection
error_types.description: Citation to specific volume of multi-volume collection omits volume number
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Essay Title, in Book Title 123 (Jane Smith ed., 2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Essay Title, in 5 Book Title 123 (Jane Smith ed., 2020)

error_types.error_type: Insufficient Document Description
error_types.description: Collected document citation lacks identifying details (date, addressee, etc.)
error_types.example_incorrect: Letter, in 5 Collected Letters of X (Z ed., 2000)
error_types.example_correct: Letter from X to Y (Dec. 1, 1900), in 5 Collected Letters of X 67 (Z ed., 2000)

error_types.error_type: Missing Page Reference in Document Collection
error_types.description: Citation to collected document lacks page number
error_types.example_incorrect: Letter from X to Y (Dec. 1, 1900), in 5 Collected Letters of X (Z ed., 2000)
error_types.example_correct: Letter from X to Y (Dec. 1, 1900), in 5 Collected Letters of X 67 (Z ed., 2000)

error_types.error_type: Missing Section Type Designation
error_types.description: Citation to foreword/introduction/preface lacks designation ('Foreword', 'Introduction', etc.)
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Doe, in John Smith, Book Title xiii (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Jane Doe, Introduction, in John Smith, Book Title xiii (2020)

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Use of Roman Numerals for Introduction Page
error_types.description: Page citation to introduction fails to use proper roman numeral format
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Doe, Introduction, in John Smith, Book Title 13 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Jane Doe, Introduction, in John Smith, Book Title xiii (2020)

error_types.error_type: Missing Titled Introduction/Foreword Reference
error_types.description: Titled introduction/foreword citation omits title of the section
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Doe, Introduction, in John Smith, Book Title (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Jane Doe, Introduction: Title of Introduction, in John Smith, Book Title xiii (2020)

error_types.error_type: Missing Series Name in Serial Numbered Work
error_types.description: Citation to series-numbered work omits series name
error_types.example_incorrect: Author, Title, No. 123 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Author, Title, Univ. of X Working Paper No. 123 (2020)

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Serial Number Format
error_types.description: Series number presentation uses incorrect abbreviation or format
error_types.example_incorrect: Author, Title, Series Number 123 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Author, Title, Univ. of X Working Paper No. 123 (2020)

error_types.error_type: Incomplete Looseleaf Service Citation
error_types.description: Looseleaf citation lacks required release date or update information
error_types.example_incorrect: Charles Alan Wright et al., Federal Practice & Procedure § 1234
error_types.example_correct: 2 Charles Alan Wright et al., Federal Practice & Procedure § 1234 (3d ed. 2019)

error_types.error_type: Missing Update Date for Looseleaf Materials
error_types.description: Looseleaf or regularly updated work cited without most recent update date
error_types.example_incorrect: Wright, Federal Practice & Procedure § 1234 (2015)
error_types.example_correct: Wright, Federal Practice & Procedure § 1234 (Supp. 2020)

error_types.error_type: Inadequate Court Rules Citation
error_types.description: Court rules pamphlet or special forms cited without required identifying information
error_types.example_incorrect: Court Rules (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Federal Rules of Civil Procedure Rule 12(b), 28 U.S.C. (2020)

error_types.error_type: Print Citation Omitted When Online Only
error_types.description: Book accessed online cited without attempting to identify print publication info
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, Book Title (available at https://example.com)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, Book Title (2020) (available at https://example.com)

error_types.error_type: Incomplete E-Book Citation
error_types.description: E-book citation lacks required information about database or publication format
error_types.example_incorrect: John Smith, Book Title (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Smith, Book Title (2020) (Westlaw)

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Use of 'Id.' with Different Book
error_types.description: Using 'Id.' to reference different book than immediately preceding citation
error_types.example_incorrect: [Cite book A] Id. [referring to book B]
error_types.example_correct: [Cite book A] [Full or supra citation to book B]

error_types.error_type: Missing Short Title in Hereinafter Abbreviation
error_types.description: First citation lacks hereinafter abbreviation for works with long titles
error_types.example_incorrect: [Later cite:] Long Title, supra note 5, at 100
error_types.example_correct: [First cite:] ... (hereinafter "Short Title")] [Later cite:] Short Title, supra note 5, at 100

error_types.error_type: Ambiguous Supra Reference Without Author Name
error_types.description: Short cite using supra lacks author name when needed for clarity
error_types.example_incorrect: Supra note 5, at 100
error_types.example_correct: Smith, supra note 5, at 100

error_types.subrule_title: Short Forms for Works in Collection
error_types.error_type: Missing Author Name in Chapter Short Citation
error_types.description: Short citation to chapter in collection omits chapter author's name
error_types.example_incorrect: Supra note 12, at 45
error_types.example_correct: Doe, supra note 12, at 45

error_types.subrule_title: Short Forms for Works in Collection
error_types.error_type: Insufficient Disambiguation Between Multiple Chapters
error_types.description: Short citation to collection fails to distinguish between multiple chapters
error_types.example_incorrect: [When citing multiple chapters:] Supra note 10 [and] Supra note 12
error_types.example_correct: Doe, supra note 10, at 45 [and] Smith, supra note 12, at 100

error_types.error_type: Missing Journal Abbreviation
error_types.description: Law review citation uses full journal name instead of required abbreviation
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harvard Law Review 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

error_types.error_type: Magazine Citation Missing Month/Date
error_types.description: Magazine article citation lacks required month or specific date
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Smith, Article, Time 20 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Jane Smith, Article, Time, Jan. 1, 2020, at 20

error_types.error_type: Newspaper Citation Without Page Reference
error_types.description: Newspaper article citation omitted page number or 'at' notation
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times, Jan. 5, 2021
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times, Jan. 5, 2021, at A1

error_types.error_type: Missing Volume Number in Academic Journal Citation
error_types.description: Academic journal citation lacks required volume number
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Article Title, Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

error_types.error_type: Incorrect 'Et Al.' Usage for Two Authors
error_types.description: Using 'et al.' for two-author article instead of listing both
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe et al., Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe & Jane Smith, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

error_types.error_type: Missing Author for Unsigned Student Note
error_types.description: Unsigned student note/comment fails to include 'Comment' or 'Note' designation
error_types.example_incorrect: Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Comment, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

error_types.error_type: Institutional Author Improperly Abbreviated
error_types.description: Institutional author uses non-standard or overly abbreviated form
error_types.example_incorrect: ABA, Article Title, 123 ABA Rev. 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: American Bar Ass'n, Article Title, 123 A.B.A. Rev. 456 (2020)

error_types.error_type: Title Not Italicized or Properly Quoted
error_types.description: Article title presented without proper italics (academic) or quotes (court documents)
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020) [with title italicized in academic context]

error_types.error_type: Capitalization Error in Article Title
error_types.description: Article title uses incorrect capitalization pattern
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, article title here, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article Title Here, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

error_types.error_type: Omitted Punctuation from Original Title
error_types.description: Article title altered by omitting original punctuation (e.g., question mark, colon)
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Article Title (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article Title? (2020) [if original had question mark]

error_types.error_type: Unnecessary Issue Number in Consecutively Paginated Journal
error_types.description: Including issue number for consecutively paginated journal where not needed
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev., no. 3, 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

error_types.error_type: Unnecessary Month Citation in Consecutively Paginated Journal
error_types.description: Citing month for consecutively paginated journal where volume/year sufficient
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (Jan. 2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

error_types.error_type: Missing Issue Number for Non-Consecutively Paginated Journal
error_types.description: Non-consecutively paginated journal citation lacks required issue number
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Doe, Article, 4 Int'l J. of Law 15 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Jane Doe, Article, 4(3) Int'l J. of Law 15 (2020)

error_types.error_type: Vague Date Citation for Magazine Without Exact Date
error_types.description: Magazine citation provides only year instead of specific month/date
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Doe, Article, Time 54 (2021)
error_types.example_correct: Jane Doe, Article, Time, Mar. 3, 2021, at 54

error_types.error_type: Inconsistent Date Format in Periodical Citation
error_types.description: Date format differs from Bluebook standard (e.g., 'March 3' instead of 'Mar. 3')
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Doe, Article, Time, March 3, 2021, at 54
error_types.example_correct: Jane Doe, Article, Time, Mar. 3, 2021, at 54

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Newspaper Name Abbreviation
error_types.description: Newspaper name abbreviated incorrectly or inconsistently
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Article, NYT, Jan. 5, 2021, at A1
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times, Jan. 5, 2021, at A1

error_types.error_type: Missing Edition Designation When Necessary
error_types.description: Citation to different newspaper edition fails to note edition parenthetically
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times, Jan. 5, 2021, at A1
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times, Jan. 5, 2021, at A1 (late ed.)

error_types.error_type: Online Newspaper Citation Without Required Information
error_types.description: Online newspaper article cited without URL or proper format
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times Online, Jan. 5, 2021
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article, N.Y. Times (Jan. 5, 2021), https://nytimes.com/article

error_types.error_type: Missing 'Note' or 'Comment' Designation for Student Piece
error_types.description: Unsigned student piece cited without indicating it is a Note or Comment
error_types.example_incorrect: Unsigned Note Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Comment, Note Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Formatting of 'Note' or 'Comment' Designation
error_types.description: 'Note' or 'Comment' not properly italicized or positioned
error_types.example_incorrect: Note Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Note, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020) [with Note italicized in academic context]

error_types.error_type: Missing Parenthetical Identifying Book Under Review
error_types.description: Book review article lacks parenthetical indicating which book is reviewed
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Doe, Title of Review, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017)
error_types.example_correct: Jane Doe, Title of Review, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017) (reviewing John Smith, Book Title (2016))

error_types.error_type: Incomplete Book Information in Review Parenthetical
error_types.description: Book review parenthetical lacks author, title, or publication year of book reviewed
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Doe, Title of Review, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017) (reviewing Book Title)
error_types.example_correct: Jane Doe, Title of Review, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017) (reviewing John Smith, Book Title (2016))

error_types.error_type: Missing Symposium Designation Parenthetical
error_types.description: Article part of symposium cited without parenthetical indicating symposium topic
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Doe, Article Title, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017)
error_types.example_correct: Jane Doe, Article Title, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017) (Symposium: Law and Technology)

error_types.error_type: Unclear Symposium Context in Citation
error_types.description: Symposium article citation lacks clarity regarding symposium topic or nature
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Doe, Article Title, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017) (Special Issue)
error_types.example_correct: Jane Doe, Article Title, 130 Harv. L. Rev. 123 (2017) (Symposium: Legal Issues in Technology)

error_types.error_type: Missing Special Designation for Journal Section
error_types.description: Article from journal's special section (like 'Developments' or 'Recent Cases') lacks designation
error_types.example_incorrect: Developments in Education Law, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: Developments in Education Law, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020) [or indicate parenthetically if needed]

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Commentary Format
error_types.description: Commentary or informal piece cited without proper designation or format
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Informal Comment, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Comment, Informal Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020) [with appropriate formatting]

error_types.error_type: Combined Citation for Multipart Article Without Explanation
error_types.description: Multipart article cited as single citation without noting it spans multiple issues
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020) (pt. 1), 124 Harv. L. Rev. 789 (2021) (pt. 2)

error_types.error_type: Missing Part Designation in Multipart Citation
error_types.description: When citing specific part of multipart article, part number lacking
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article Title, 123 Harv. L. Rev. 456 (2020) (pt. 1)

error_types.error_type: Missing Annotation Topic
error_types.description: A.L.R. annotation citation lacks topic description after 'Annotation'
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Annotation, 12 A.L.R.5th 123 (1993)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Annotation, Validity of X, 12 A.L.R.5th 123 (1993)

error_types.error_type: Incorrect A.L.R. Series Designation
error_types.description: A.L.R. annotation cites incorrect series (5th, 6th, etc.)
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Annotation, Validity of X, 12 A.L.R. 123 (1993)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Annotation, Validity of X, 12 A.L.R.5th 123 (1993)

error_types.subrule_title: Proceedings, Institute Publications, and ABA Section Reports
error_types.error_type: Incomplete Conference Proceedings Citation
error_types.description: Conference proceedings article lacks complete publication information
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, Article Title (2019)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article Title, in Proceedings of the ABA Section of Antitrust Law 45 (2019)

error_types.subrule_title: Proceedings, Institute Publications, and ABA Section Reports
error_types.error_type: Missing CLE Material Publication Details
error_types.description: Continuing legal education material cited without sufficient publication info
error_types.example_incorrect: John Doe, CLE Article (2019)
error_types.example_correct: John Doe, Article Title, in 2019 CLE Program Materials: X Institute 456 (2019)

error_types.error_type: Missing Organization as Author for Newsletter
error_types.description: Newsletter citation lacks organization name when no individual author given
error_types.example_incorrect: Privacy Newsletter, Jan. 2020, at 2
error_types.example_correct: ACLU Privacy Newsletter, Jan. 2020, at 2

error_types.error_type: Insufficient Availability Information for Noncommercial Periodical
error_types.description: Citation to noncommercially distributed periodical lacks parenthetical about availability
error_types.example_incorrect: ACLU Privacy Newsletter, Jan. 2020, at 2
error_types.example_correct: ACLU Privacy Newsletter, Jan. 2020, at 2 (on file with author)

error_types.error_type: Missing URL for Online-Only Periodical Article
error_types.description: Article available only online cited without URL
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Doe, Blog Post Title, LAW BLOG (Jan. 2, 2020)
error_types.example_correct: Jane Doe, Blog Post Title, LAW BLOG (Jan. 2, 2020, 10:00 AM), https://lawblog.com/post

error_types.error_type: Missing DOI or Sufficient Identifier for Online Journal Article
error_types.description: Online journal article ahead of print cited without DOI or other identifier
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Doe, Article Title, Journal Name (forthcoming 2021)
error_types.example_correct: Jane Doe, Article Title, Journal Name (forthcoming 2021), https://doi.org/10.xxx

error_types.error_type: Inaccessible or Incomplete URL
error_types.description: URL provided is incomplete, broken, or does not lead to correct source
error_types.example_incorrect: Jane Doe, Article, Blog (2020), https://lawblog.com
error_types.example_correct: Jane Doe, Article, Blog (Jan. 2, 2020), https://lawblog.com/2020/01/02/article-title

error_types.error_type: Incorrect Use of 'Id.' for Different Article
error_types.description: Using 'Id.' to reference different article than immediately preceding citation
error_types.example_incorrect: [Cite article A] Id. [referring to article B]
error_types.example_correct: [Cite article A] [Full or supra citation to article B]

error_types.error_type: Missing Author Last Name in Supra Citation
error_types.description: Short citation using supra lacks author last name necessary for clarity
error_types.example_incorrect: Supra note 4, at 460
error_types.example_correct: Doe, supra note 4, at 460

error_types.error_type: Ambiguous Multiple Works by Same Author
error_types.description: Short citation fails to distinguish between multiple works by same author
error_types.example_incorrect: [When multiple Doe articles cited:] Doe, supra note 4
error_types.example_correct: Doe, Article Title, supra note 4

error_types.error_type: Improper Use of 'Supra' for Cases and Primary Sources
error_types.description: Using 'supra' reference for case or primary source instead of permitted shortforms
error_types.example_incorrect: [Case:] Supra note 5
error_types.example_correct: [Case:] Id. or full citation as appropriate

missing_required_elements.description: Common errors involving missing required citation elements

formatting_errors.description: Errors related to proper formatting and typography

disambiguation_issues.description: Errors causing ambiguity or inability to identify source

source_selection_errors.description: Errors in selecting inappropriate or wrong citation sources

validation_focus_areas: Verify all required elements present in administrative citations (volume, page, date)
Check title formatting and punctuation matches original source
Confirm editor/translator designations use correct abbreviations (ed./eds., trans.)
Validate journal abbreviations against Table T13
Ensure proper et al. usage (only for 3+ authors)
Verify short-form citations have prior full citations
Check electronic sources include URLs and access dates where required
Confirm admin documents cite to official sources before commercial databases
